name: control-mate-utils
description: Network and resource management utility for ControlMate PC

scripts.build: npm run build-css && npm run build-go
scripts.dev: npm run setup && npm run dev:css
scripts.setup: npm run clean && mkdir -p ./build/static && cp ./src/static/app.js ./build/static/ && node -e "const pkg = require('./package.json'); require('fs').writeFileSync('./build/static/version.txt', pkg.version);"
scripts.dev:go: npm run build-css && go run main.go
